properties.name: Ide Dari Kardus
properties.description: Menceritakan ide-ide dari seorang remaja ketika melihat barang bekas khusunya kardus
properties.author: Naf'an Rizkilah

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Kardus adalah bahan utama, perlu alat lain seperti gunting, lem, dan lain-lain supaya lebih berguna

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Cutter dipakai untuk memotong bagian suatu bahan

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Cutter dipakai untuk memotong bagian suatu bahan

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Kertas bisa dipakai untuk membuat rancangan mainan

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Lakban bisa dipakai jika tidak ada lem, tapi terkadang kurang efektif

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Lem dipakai untuk merekatkan bahan-bahan seperti kardus, hati-hati saat memakai lem

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Penggaris dipakai untuk membantu menggambar garis atau bentuk lain

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Sarung Tangan dipakai supaya lebih aman saat memakai lem atau memotong sesuatu

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Botol (plastik) bisa dipakai untuk membuat bagian transparan seperti kaca

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Spidol bisa dipakai untuk menggambar bagian yang akan dipotong

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Spidol Berwarna dipakai untuk menghias mainan

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Stik dipakai untuk membuat bagian yang lebih kuat dari kardus, seperti kerangka

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Tusuk Sate bisa dipakai untuk membuat bagian yang bisa diputar, seperti baling-baling atau bagian yang menghubungkan roda

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Tutup botol bisa dipakai untuk membuat roda daripada memakai roda dari kardus

variables.name: desc
variables.value: Sedotan bisa dipakai untuk membuat bagian yang bisa diputar, seperti baling-baling atau bagian yang menyangga roda

objects.name: MonologText
objects.string: Sedotan bisa dipakai untuk membuat bagian yang bisa diputar, seperti baling-baling atau bagian yang menyangga rod

content.text: Sedotan bisa dipakai untuk membuat bagian yang bisa diputar, seperti baling-baling atau bagian yang menyangga rod

events.comment: Replace every placeholder with a random card.
The second card has been revealed, wait a moment and turn cards again
A pair was found, remove the pair
No pair was found, cover back the cards

events.comment: Replace every placeholder with a random card.
The second card has been revealed, wait a moment and turn cards again
A pair was found, remove the pair
No pair was found, cover back the cards

objects.name: InfoTxt
objects.string:
Game ini sangat simpel, kamu hanya perlu mencocokkan kartu yang sama. Jika kamu berhasil mencocokkan kartu yang sama maka alex akan berbicara. Jika kamu berhasil sampai di level terakhir maka akan ada hadiah tersendiri

Semoga Beruntung!

content.text:
Game ini sangat simpel, kamu hanya perlu mencocokkan kartu yang sama. Jika kamu berhasil mencocokkan kartu yang sama maka alex akan berbicara. Jika kamu berhasil sampai di level terakhir maka akan ada hadiah tersendiri

Semoga Beruntung!

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteButton
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A button that can be customized.
description: A button that can be used for menus and most labelled buttons of a game. The button can be customized with a background for each state and a label. It handles user interactions and a simple condition can be used to check if it is clicked.
There are ready-to-use buttons in the asset-store [menu buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons).

changelog.breaking: - Buttons now use "variants", allowing easy swapping of their visual aspect. You will have to make some adjustments to existing buttons in your project. Follow this [migration documentation](https://wiki.gdevelop.io/gdevelop5/objects/custom-objects-prefab-template/migrate-to-variants/) to do these changes.

Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

events.comment: The previous animation is not yet finished, flip the other way around starting from there.

Update the flipped state as users may flip the object directly without using this extension.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ObjectStack
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: An ordered list of objects and a shuffle action.
description: * Actions to modify a stack of objects
* Conditions to access the objects of a stack
* Fair randomness (for instance, to create a stack of predetermined bonus and randomize the order they appear)
* a card system demonstration ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://card-system))

eventsFunctions.description: Define helper classes JavaScript code.
eventsFunctions.name: DefineHelperClasses

inlineCode: // Remove from deleted objects from stacks.
* Make contains(), remove() and unicity checks more efficients.
// The top element is likely to be removed from the stack.
for (let height = lowerBound; height <= upperBound; height++) {
for (let height = lowerBound; height <= upperBound; height++) {
for (let i = lowerBound; i <= upperBound; i++) {

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the stack contains the object between a range. The lower and upper bounds are included.
eventsFunctions.name: ContainsBetween
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM3_ is into the stack of _PARAM1_ between _PARAM4_ and _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the stack contains the object at a height.
eventsFunctions.name: ContainsAt
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM3_ is into the stack of _PARAM1_ at _PARAM4_

inlineCode: // This code is duplicated from ContainsBetween because the picking wouldn't pass from one function to the other.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object is on the stack top.
eventsFunctions.name: HasOnTop
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM3_ is on top of the stack of _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the stack contains the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Contains

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Hold an ordered list of objects.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ObjectStack

inlineCode: // Its only use is to have a O(1) check for
// deleted objects that have never been in a stack.

eventsFunctions.description: Add the object on the top of the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: AddOnTop
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add _PARAM2_ on top of the stack of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Insert the object into the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: Insert
eventsFunctions.sentence: Insert _PARAM2_ into the stack of _PARAM0_ at height: _PARAM3_

inlineCode: console.error(`Tried to insert in the stack at ${height} where the stack is ${stack.length} height.`);

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the object from the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: Remove

eventsFunctions.description: Remove any object from the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: Clear
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove every object of the stack of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Move the objects from a stack into another.
eventsFunctions.name: MoveInto
eventsFunctions.sentence: Move the objects of the stack of _PARAM3_ from:_PARAM5_ to:_PARAM6_ into the stack of _PARAM0_ at height: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Move all the object from a stack into another.
eventsFunctions.name: MoveAllInto
eventsFunctions.sentence: Move all the objects of the stack of _PARAM3_ into the stack of _PARAM0_ at height: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Move all the object from a stack into another one at the top.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Move all on top of the stack
eventsFunctions.name: MoveAllOnTop
eventsFunctions.sentence: Move all the objects of the stack of _PARAM2_ on the top of the stack of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Shuffle the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: Shuffle

eventsFunctions.name: HeightOf

eventsFunctions.description: the number of objects in the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: Height
eventsFunctions.sentence: the number of objects in the stack

eventsFunctions.description: Compare the number of objects in the stack.
eventsFunctions.name: CheckHeight

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the stack is empty.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEmpty

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Auto typing animation for text ("typewriter" effect)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AutoTyping
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
description: Reveal a text one letter after the other (a "typewriter" effect).
It can be used for dialogue scenes or visual novels on Text and Bitmap Text objects.
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AutoTyping

events.comment: Temporary add the next word and check if it's adding a new line.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the full text has been typed.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFinished

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a character has just been typed. Useful for triggering sound effects.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustTyped

eventsFunctions.description: Restart typing from the beginning of text. The autotyping also start automatically when a new text is set for the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RestartFromBeginning
eventsFunctions.sentence: Restart typing from the beginning on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Jump to a specific position in the text. Positions start at "0" and increase by one for every character.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpToPosition

eventsFunctions.description: Show the full text.
eventsFunctions.name: ShowFullText

eventsFunctions.description: the time between characters beign typed.
eventsFunctions.name: Interval

propertyDescriptors.label: Detect if a new text character was just displayed
